reviews.review: Actually a 100% free to play game. No pay to win features as far as I know and all heroes are available for free immediately. Really well done.

Maybe no one dont know about this game. But seriously this game is good for ur "wasting time" and ur calm.

Nope. It's all about playing with friend or never
